title: 39th Chelsea International Fine Art Competition Exhibition
description: Agora Gallery’s annual juried exhibition features paintings, sculptures, and mixed media pieces. Opening reception 8/21 6-8pm.

title: Eighth Annual Rockaway Film Festival
description: The Rockaway Film Festival returns to Averne Cinema for five days of indoor and outdoor screenings and live music.

title: Ninth Annual East Village Queer Film Festival
description: Highlights queer-themed shorts, features, and documentaries by and featuring LGBTQIA+ artists at The Wild Project (East Village).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Dog Day Afternoon
description: Watch 'Dog Day Afternoon' at Fort Greene Park (Brooklyn).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Hidden Figures
description: Watch 'Hidden Figures' at Brooklyn Bridge Park's Pier 1 Harbor View Lawn.
address: Brooklyn Bridge Park, Pier 1 Harbor View Lawn

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Love + Basketball
description: Watch 'Love + Basketball' at 145th St and the Hudson in Riverside Park (West Harlem).
address: 145th St and the Hudson, Riverside Park, West Harlem

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Soundtrack to a Coup D’état
description: Watch 'Soundtrack to a Coup D’état' with a pre-screening performance by T.K. Blue at the Jackie Robinson Bandshell (West Harlem).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Bend It Like Beckham
description: Watch 'Bend It Like Beckham' at Pier I at Riverside Park South (UWS).
address: Pier I, Riverside Park South, UWS

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Downton Abbey: A New Era
description: Watch 'Downton Abbey: A New Era' at Pier A Park (Hoboken).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Holes
description: Watch 'Holes' at Dyker Beach Park.

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
description: Watch 'Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade' at Prospect Park.

title: Free Outdoor Movies: The Royal Tenenbaums
description: Watch 'The Royal Tenenbaums' at Elizabeth Street Garden (Nolita).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Up
description: Watch 'Up' at Corporal John A Seravalli Playground (West Village).
address: Corporal John A Seravalli Playground, West Village

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Party Girl
description: Watch 'Party Girl' at Parklife (Gowanus). Note: food/drink purchase required.

title: Summerstage: Free Concert with Joey Valence + Brae
description: Summerstage presents a free concert with hip-hop duo Joey Valence + Brae at Central Park's Rumsey Playfield.

title: Adam Wade: Live in New York
description: 20-time Moth Story Slam winner Adam Wade returns to Under St. Marks Theater with a storytelling show.
address: Under St. Marks Theater, East Village

title: Will You Accept This Rose? Live with Arden Myrin
description: Podcast host Arden Myrin discusses the latest 'The Bachelor' episode at Union Hall (Park Slope).

title: We Have Fun: A Stand-Up Show
description: Hosts Zach Sims and Dan Wilbur bring the fun-ny to Young Ethel’s (South Slope) with stand-up.

title: Ambush Comedy Show
description: The Ambush Comedy Show buzzes into Hellrazor Barber Shop in Williamsburg with a lineup of comedians.

title: Night Market Comedy
description: A mostly Asian comedy show at Emmy Squared (East Village) featuring standup by various comedians.

title: Rooftop Films Presents: Lurker
description: The popular rooftop films series returns for its 29th season at The Old American Can Factory (Gowanus).
address: The Old American Can Factory, Gowanus

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Forrest Gump
description: Watch 'Forrest Gump' on the rooftop at Pier 17 (Lower Manhattan).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Madagascar
description: Watch 'Madagascar' at Herbert Von King Park (Bed-Stuy).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: The Goonies
description: Watch 'The Goonies' at Bella Abzug Park (Hell’s Kitchen).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Wicked
description: Watch 'Wicked' at Village Park (Jersey City).

title: 2-for-1 Broadway Week Tickets
description: 2-for-1 Broadway week tickets go on sale today for performances running 9/8 thru 9/21.

title: Brooklyn Books + Booze
description: Hear established and up-and-coming authors read from their current works at Barrow's Intense Tasting Room (Industry City).
address: Barrow's Intense Tasting Room, Industry City

title: Astronomy on Tap: 100th Birthday of Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin’s Thesis
description: A night where astronomy enthusiasts gather for talks by professional scientists and themed games at Pete's Candy Store (Williamsburg).

title: The Broad Squad
description: A monthly comedy variety show featuring a female-fronted lineup and tarot readings at Young Ethel’s (South Slope).

title: Animation Nights New York
description: Watch a curated program of animated short films from around the world at The Gutter Spare Room (Williamsburg).

title: Cinema Smootaphilia: In the Realm of the Senses
description: Ensemble Erotic performs a live, original soundtrack to Nagisa Ōshima’s 1976 erotic classic at TV Eye (Ridgewood).
